name: Saddle & Bridle
description: Allows riding a horse.

name: Bedroll
description: A minimal sleeping arrangement for a rugged adventurer.

name: Blanket & Pillow
description: Soft and warm. An adventurer need not forsake all comfort.

name: Gyroscope
description: A curious spinning doodad. Much prized by tinkers, and to a lesser extent by street magicians and charlatans.

name: Talisman
description: A blessed or holy artifact designed to nullify the trickery of evil spirits.

name: Manacles
description: For restraining the unruly or unwilling. Breakable by a successful DT 20 strength check.

name: Signet Ring & Sealing Wax
description: Allows a distinctive wax seal to be affixed to scrolls and letters. Provides proof of authenticity and prevents tampering.

name: Parchment
description: A single blank page of parchment

name: Inkpot & Quill
description: An ounce of ink, sufficient to fill 1000 pages, at least.

name: Scroll
description: 5 feet of blank parchment.

name: Chalk
description: For writing upon stone or rough surfaces.

name: Crystal Ball
description: Aids in scrying, divination, and certain forms of astrology. Highly prized by mages.

name: Magical Wand
description: Used by casters to direct and focus magical energy. Favored by scholars and warlocks.

name: Magical Staff
description: Infused with deep, yet subtle magic. Favored by druids, wizards and prophets.

name: Bell
description: For calling others to attention, or summoning spirits, depending on one's needs.

name: Censer
description: For the ceremonial burning of incense. Infused with magic of a theurgical sort.

name: Incense
description: 1 pound of sweet smelling incense. An indispensable component of theurgical rituals.

name: Perfume
description: Known as cologne, when sold to men. Lends a pleasant scent to one that wears it. Increases charisma by 1 for one hours, if one has washed with soap. 10 uses.

name: Soap
description: Washes away sweat and grime, more than plain water. +1 to persuasion and performance checks for 12 hours. 10 uses.

name: Utensils
description: Steel silverware, for fine eating even in rugged places.

name: Barding
description: Defensive armor for a horse. Increases BC while riding by 5.

name: Hunting Trap
description: Reusable. For trapping small animals, such as rabbits, mice, or gophers.

name: Caltrops, 10x
description: Apt to stop charging cavalry, or wound the feet of careless attackers.

name: Chain
description: 10 yards. Heavy, but holds up to 10,000 pounds of weight.

name: String
description: 50 feet of string wrapped around a spindle. Its use depends on one's wit and creativity. It entertains cats, if nothing else.

name: Traveler's Chess Set
description: The game of kings. Conveniently designed to allow the board to be folded and stowed along with the pieces.

name: Gambler's Dice
description: A full set. Includes a d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, and d20, for games of chance.

name: Deck of Cards
description: An ordinary deck of cards, tinged with the faint scent of alcohol and tobacco.

name: Dinghy
description: Includes oars, and carries up to 4 people or 600 pounds of weight.

name: Arrow
description: Ammunition for drawn bows.

name: Bolt
description: Ammunition for crossbows.

name: Bullet
description: Ammunition for firearms.
